document_data.name: ''Gauntlets of Dexterity''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gauntlets of dexterity''''' were a set of [[gauntlet]]s that increased the wearer's dexterity.
document_data.Description:
These [[magic]] gauntlets looked like a standard pair of leather gauntlets, but when worn, magically fit to the perfect size for the wearer. They radiated magic, and thus could only be discovered by ''[[detect magic|detecting magic]]'' or similar means.

The less dexterous the wearer was, the better the gauntlets functioned. They also allowed the wearer to pick locks or pickpocket others; if the wearer was already versed in these skills, they would become more proficient at them.
